title: Andrea Bocelli: a night in Tuscany [Widescreen]
creator_credit: David Amphlett, Lana Topham, Propaganda Films and Insieme SRL
brief_description: On a warm September night at the Piazza dei Cavalieri in the ancient city of Pisa, Tuscany, the voice that has captured the hearts of millions, Andrea Bocelli, performed as part of a momentous outdoor event in his home town. He was joined on the stage for duets by Nuccia Focile, Sarah Brightman and Zucchero, as they presented an assortment of classical and popular ballads. Songs perfomed include; “Nestle dorma”, “La Donna e mobile”, “Lamento di federico”, “O Soave fanciulla”, “Brindisi”, “Torna a surriento”, “O Sole mio”, “Con te partiro”, “Romanza”, “E Chiove”, “Voglio restare cosi”, “Caruso”, “Misrere”, and “Time to say goodbye”.
